==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|こう|にゅう|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
{{IPAchar|/koːnipu/}} → {{IPAchar|/koːniɸu/}} → {{IPAchar|/koːniu/}} → {{IPAchar|/koːnjuː/}}

From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=こうにゅう}} compound {{m|zh|購入|tr=kuw<sup>H</sup> nyip|lit=present, give + enter}}. Compare modern {{etyl|yue|-}} reading ''kau<sup>3</sup> jap<sup>6</sup>''.

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|yomi=o|こうにゅう|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|こうにゅう|hhira=こうにふ}}

# a [[purchase]], the act of [[buy]]ing something

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|こうにゅう|hhira=こうにふ}}

# to [[purchase]]

====Conjugation====
{{ja-suru|こうにゅう}}

====Usage notes====
Just as with English {{m|en|purchase}} compared to {{m|en|buy}}, the Chinese-derived {{lang|ja|購入する}} (''kōnyū suru'') is more formal than the native Japanese term {{ja-l|買う||kau}}. This is an example of the usual formality difference between [[kango]] terms versus native Japanese terms ({{m|ja|大和言葉|tr=Yamato kotoba}}).

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|買う|かう}}
